select p.PROJECT_ID, p.PROJECT_NUM, p.PROJECT_NAME, p.PROJECT_EMPLOYER, p.PROJECT_MANAGER, p.TECHNICAL_DIRECTOR, p.START_TIME, p.FINISH_TIME, p.PROJECT_PRICE, p.PROJECT_TAX, p.TOTAL_PRICES, p.FINAL_NOTAX, p.FINAL_TAX, p.FINAL_TOTAL, p.PROJECT_STATE, p.REMARK from PROJECT_INFO p where 1=1
and p.PROJECT_NUM like CONCAT('%',#{PROJECT_NUM},'%')
and p.PROJECT_NAME like CONCAT('%',#{PROJECT_NAME},'%')
and p.PROJECT_EMPLOYER like CONCAT('%',#{PROJECT_EMPLOYER},'%')
and p.PROJECT_MANAGER like CONCAT('%',#{PROJECT_MANAGER},'%')
and p.PROJECT_STATE = #{PROJECT_STATE}
and p.PROJECT_STATE = '00'
mapper.update: update PROJECT_INFO set PROJECT_NAME = #{PROJECT_NAME}, PROJECT_EMPLOYER = #{PROJECT_EMPLOYER}, PROJECT_MANAGER = #{PROJECT_MANAGER}, TECHNICAL_DIRECTOR = #{TECHNICAL_DIRECTOR}, START_TIME = #{START_TIME}, FINISH_TIME = #{FINISH_TIME}, PROJECT_PRICE = ${PROJECT_PRICE}, PROJECT_TAX = ${PROJECT_TAX}, TOTAL_PRICES = ${TOTAL_PRICES}, FINAL_NOTAX = ${FINAL_NOTAX}, FINAL_TAX = ${FINAL_TAX}, FINAL_TOTAL = ${FINAL_TOTAL}, REMARK = #{REMARK} where PROJECT_ID = #{PROJECT_ID}
mapper.select: select FIRST_ID, FIRST_NUM, PROJECT_ID, PAYDATE, PAYMENT, BALANCE, REMARK from FIRST_PAYMENT where PROJECT_ID = #{PROJECT_ID} union all select '-' as FIRST_ID, '-' as FIRST_NUM, '00' as PROJECT_ID, '合计' as PAYDATE, sum(PAYMENT) as PAYMENT, '-' as BALANCE, '-' as REMARK from FIRST_PAYMENT where PROJECT_ID = #{PROJECT_ID} order by PAYDATE asc

select OUT_ID, OUT_NUM, PROJECT_ID, PAYDATE, PAYMENT, PAYNOTAX, TAXVALUE, UPTAX, ADDTAX, OTHERTAX, BALANCE, REMARK from out_invoice where PROJECT_ID = #{PROJECT_ID} union all select '-' OUT_ID, '-' OUT_NUM, '00' PROJECT_ID, '合计' PAYDATE, sum(PAYMENT) PAYMENT, sum(PAYNOTAX) PAYNOTAX, sum(TAXVALUE) TAXVALUE, sum(UPTAX) UPTAX, sum(ADDTAX) ADDTAX, sum(OTHERTAX) OTHERTAX, '-' BALANCE, '-' REMARK from out_invoice where PROJECT_ID = #{PROJECT_ID} order by PAYDATE asc
mapper.update: update out_invoice set PAYDATE = #{PAYDATE}, PAYMENT = ${PAYMENT}, PAYNOTAX = ${PAYNOTAX}, TAXVALUE = ${TAXVALUE}, BALANCE = ${BALANCE}, UPTAX = ${UPTAX}, ADDTAX = ${ADDTAX}, OTHERTAX = ${OTHERTAX}, REMARK = #{REMARK} where OUT_ID = #{OUT_ID}
mapper.select: select INPUT_ID, INPUT_NUM, PROJECT_ID, PAYDATE, PAYMENT, PAYNOTAX, TAXVALUE, TAXBALANCE, REMARK from input_invoice where PROJECT_ID = #{PROJECT_ID} union all select '-' INPUT_ID, '-' INPUT_NUM, '00' PROJECT_ID, '合计' PAYDATE, sum(PAYMENT) PAYMENT, sum(PAYNOTAX) PAYNOTAX, sum(TAXVALUE) TAXVALUE, '-' TAXBALANCE, '-' REMARK from input_invoice where PROJECT_ID = #{PROJECT_ID} order by PAYDATE asc
mapper.update: update input_invoice set PAYDATE = #{PAYDATE}, PAYMENT = ${PAYMENT}, PAYNOTAX = ${PAYNOTAX}, TAXVALUE = ${TAXVALUE}, TAXBALANCE = ${TAXBALANCE}, REMARK = #{REMARK} where INPUT_ID = #{INPUT_ID}
mapper.select: select INPUT_ID, INPUT_NUM, PROJECT_ID, PAYDATE, PAYMENT, PAYNOTAX, TAXVALUE, TAXBALANCE, REMARK from input_invoices where PROJECT_ID = #{PROJECT_ID} union all select '-' INPUT_ID, '-' INPUT_NUM, '00' PROJECT_ID, '合计' PAYDATE, sum(PAYMENT) PAYMENT, sum(PAYNOTAX) PAYNOTAX, sum(TAXVALUE) TAXVALUE, '-' TAXBALANCE, '-' REMARK from input_invoices where PROJECT_ID = #{PROJECT_ID} order by PAYDATE asc
mapper.update: update input_invoices set PAYDATE = #{PAYDATE}, PAYMENT = ${PAYMENT}, PAYNOTAX = ${PAYNOTAX}, TAXVALUE = ${TAXVALUE}, TAXBALANCE = ${TAXBALANCE}, REMARK = #{REMARK} where INPUT_ID = #{INPUT_ID}

update project_memo set MEMO_STATE = #{MEMO_STATE}, MEMO_TITLE = #{MEMO_TITLE}, MEMO_CONTENT = #{MEMO_CONTENT}, UPDATE_PERSON = #{UPDATE_PERSON}, UPDATE_TIME = #{UPDATE_TIME} where MEMO_ID = #{MEMO_ID}
update project_cost set COST_DATE = #{COST_DATE}, COST_DETAIL = #{COST_DETAIL}, COST_AMOUNT = ${COST_AMOUNT}, COST_TYPE = #{COST_TYPE}, COST_REMARK = #{COST_REMARK} where COST_ID = #{COST_ID}
